title: Squats
body: Best performed with 2 spotters.  1 is sufficient, not recommended without spotters.  Using a  lifting cage load the barbell with the desired weight.  Rest the bar on a comfortable location on the shoulders.  Grab the bar using a closed grip to prevent rolling or falling.  Keep the weight on your heels as you lower your body down as low as possible, at least till reaching a chair height.  Stand up and repeat.
